result.execSummary:
The defendant Ezequiel C Noriega was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

Absolute Sobreity, 
Domestic Violence assessment and follow-through,  
No Contact w/M.A.N.,  
AODA Assessment and follow-through.
All financials same as noted above.

records.addlTxt: 1-MAN, 2-ARN
to DE of Penalties

Defendant Ezequiel C Noriega in court with attorney Megan Carollo.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter SR sworn.  PLQ filed w/ NC pleas to Count 1 and amended Count 2.  ADA White makes recommendation.  Court reviews rights, charges & penalties w/DE.   Court accepts waiver, plea, finds factual basis, amends Count 2 and finds DE guilty.  VIS (s) filed.  ADA cites DE's history.   Atty Carollo filed victim statement w/court, requests huber and jail credit.  DE addresses the Court. Court follows recommendation, grants huber & credit.  Spanish appeal rights given to DE.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 3, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Ezequiel C Noriega in court with attorney Megan Carollo.  Interpreter R.B. present and is sworn by the Clerk.  Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attonrey Carollo indicates she had some information to provide to DA White, who is not available and would like to speak with her directly about this case.  DA Parker agrees to an adjournment.  Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 3, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Ezequiel C Noriega in court with attorney Megan Carollo.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Remi B. sworn.  Attny Carollo indicates she has not had a lot of contact with the defendant since their last hearing which was in November 2015.  Needs time to discuss the plea offer, DA has no objection.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 16, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Ezequiel C Noriega in court with attorney Megan Carollo.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  R. Bashi, interpreter sworn.  Remarks by Atty. Carollo.  Discovery issues to be taken care of.  Bond continues.

Defendant Ezequiel C Noriega in court with attorney Megan Carollo.  Catharine D White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter RB sworn.  Atty Carollo -requests NC order be lifted as to wife & child and allow family court to oversee.  ADA White - have not been able to contact parties to obtain their opinions, No Counseling by DE, No Contact w/victims, objection to motion. Court questions State re: how they tried to contact victim. Atty Carollo argues.  Court reviews family court order, denied modification until mother contacts Court and follows required proceedures.  Court reminds DE bond conditions continue.  Atty Carollo questions whether another hearing is required.  Court will require another hearing to question mother.
to Modify Bond
